samAsa: lokapAlAnAM jewAraM = karwq - karmaNi RaRTi{karwq karmaNoH kqwi = kqw prawyayaH RaRTI (2|3|650} @and karma wawpuruRa samAsaH

sva-muKEH = @most @likely karaNa wawpuruRa sAmAsaH; muKam @is wqwIyA, napuMsaka, bahuvacana @of prAwipaxikam muKa @and sva @is viSeRaNam @for muKEH. @I @was @not @sure @whether @to @split @as sva @and muKEH (@due @to @presence @of @the @adjective) @and @enter @them @spearately @in @two @rows @or @to @keep @it @as @one @word sva-muKEH @due @to @it @being @a @compound @word. @My @group @volunteer, @Sri @Vani @ji, @shared @that @Professor @Kulkarni @will @make @a @decision @regarding @such @cases @of @asamartha @samAs. @I @have @therefore, @kept @it @as @one @pada @for @now, @to @be @modified @later, @basis @whatever @instructions @we @receive @from @Professor @Amba @Kulkarni.

hindi_meaning: iSvara (Siva) kI arcanA karane vAle (Sawru rAvaNa ko)
samAsa: arciwa-ISvaram = bahuvrIhiH sAmAsaH (arciwa: iSvaraH yena saH)
wuliwa-kElAsam = bahuvrIhiH sAmAsaH (wuliwaH kElAsaH yena saH)
bahvamanyawa = avyayIBAva samAsaH @and bahu @is kriyAviSeRaNam@for @the @Verb amanyawa
